title: Entry-level DT Swiss 1900 Spline MTB wheels drop pawls, upgrade to Star Ratchet hubs
content:
DT Swiss updates their trusted entry-level affordable alloy MTB wheel lineup with a new 1900 SPLINE series, now built on their proven, more durable Star Ratchet freehub tech for all mountain bike disciplines. Essentially, by upgrading to new Ratchet LN equipped 370 hubs, the new DT Swiss 1900 Spline MTB aluminum wheelset family gets an

The post Entry-level DT Swiss 1900 Spline MTB wheels drop pawls, upgrade to Star Ratchet hubs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
